meta.name: Ka Wing Jasmine Lau
meta.about:
Avant Dance Studio 成人芭蕾舞學校
~where classical ballet becomes atypical~

Avant Dance Studio is an adult ballet school, which offers classes that are specially designed for adult students. We provide regular classes with distinct levels and Royal Academy of Dance exam-based classes for students. To help students explore their ability and go beyond their boundaries, each year we select a batch of students to participate in both solo and group competitions. Avant Dance Studio is more than a ballet school, it is also a place to inspire students and a place for you to aspire to be who you want to be!

本校所有課程均為成人而設，我們除了有不同級別的恆常班，還有考試班，讓成人學生能夠挑戰自己。為了讓學生更突破自己，我們每年會挑選學生參加個人及群舞比賽。Avant Dance Studio 不只是一間芭蕾舞學校，這裏是個讓你忠於自己夢想的地方！

電話/ Whatsapp/ WeChat: 5687 6020
網站: www.avantdancestudio.com
電郵: info@avantdancestudio.com
地址: Unit 801C, Harbour Centre Tower 1, 1 Hok Cheung Street, Hung Hom (Whampoa Station Exit A)
紅磡鶴翔街維港中心一座801C (黃埔站A出口)
